name: Association Hellenique des Commercants  et Exportareurs de cereales et d' aliments de betail
goal:
Promoting cereals, by-products and feedstuff commerce
both in the national and international markets.

The continuous improvement of the local market
organization in grains, feedstuff and by-products
trading.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: As a member of COCERAL, (European association representing the trade in cereals, rice, feedstuffs, oilseeds, olive oil, oils and fats and agrosupply) we participate in EU Consulting and Expert groups.
